clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Gemcabene in Patients With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia on Stable, Lipid-Lowering Therapy (COBALT-1)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Open-Label, Dose-Finding Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Gemcabene in Patients With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia on Stable, Lipid Lowering Therapy (COBALT-1)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of multiple doses of Gemcabene in patients with HoFH on stable, lipid-lowering therapy.

arm_group.description: Gemcabene treatment on stable background statin therapy
